title: Personalized Onboarding Assistant
description: An LLM-powered chatbot that guides new users through Notion's features based on their stated goals and use cases. The chatbot analyzes user input (text describing their needs) and provides tailored tutorials, template recommendations, and feature explanations. It proactively identifies potential roadblocks and offers solutions, significantly improving user adoption and reducing churn. The LLM leverages its understanding of Notion's extensive documentation and community knowledge to provide accurate and helpful responses. The LLM will be fine-tuned on Notion's help documentation, community forum data, and user feedback to ensure relevance and accuracy.

title: Intelligent Workspace Navigator
description: An LLM-driven feature that helps users organize and retrieve information within their Notion workspaces. Users can describe what they're looking for in natural language, and the LLM will analyze the content of pages, databases, and linked documents to identify relevant information and suggest optimal organization structures. It can automatically tag pages, create summaries, and suggest connections between related content, improving information retrieval and collaboration. The LLM leverages its text analysis capabilities to understand the context and relationships between different pieces of information within the workspace. This goes beyond simple keyword search by understanding the semantic meaning of the content.

title: Proactive Support Agent
description: An LLM-powered system that proactively identifies users who are struggling with specific tasks or features and offers targeted assistance. The system analyzes user behavior (e.g., repeated searches, failed attempts, error messages) and uses the LLM to infer the user's intent and potential challenges. It then provides relevant help articles, tutorials, or personalized guidance through a chatbot interface. This reduces support ticket volume and improves user satisfaction. The LLM leverages its understanding of common user pain points and solutions to provide effective and timely support. The LLM will be trained on historical support tickets and user forum data to identify patterns and predict user needs.

title: Automated Template Quality Control
description: An LLM-based system that automatically assesses the quality and branding consistency of user-generated templates before they are published to the Notion template gallery. The LLM analyzes the template's content, structure, and formatting to identify potential issues, such as grammatical errors, inconsistent branding, or missing information. It then provides feedback to the template creator, ensuring a high level of quality and consistency across the platform. The LLM leverages its text analysis and content generation capabilities to identify and suggest improvements to the template. This ensures that all templates meet Notion's quality standards and maintain a consistent brand identity.

title: Image-Based Document Understanding
description: An LLM-powered feature that allows users to extract information and insights from images of documents, such as handwritten notes, scanned receipts, or screenshots of whiteboards. Users upload an image, and the LLM (using its vision capabilities) analyzes the image, extracts the text, and then uses its natural language understanding capabilities to identify key information, summarize the content, and answer questions about the document. This streamlines document processing and improves information accessibility. The LLM leverages its multimodal capabilities to combine image recognition with text analysis, providing a comprehensive understanding of the document's content. This goes beyond simple OCR by understanding the context and meaning of the extracted text.
